Quote: Ignorance is a disaster for science.
French: [translate:L’ignorance est un désastre pour la science.]
Context: Promotes pursuit of education as antidote to ignorance.

Quote: Virtue is not hereditary.
French: [translate:La vertu n'est pas héréditaire.]
Context: Virtue must be learned, not inherited.

Quote: He must be very ignorant for he answers every question he is asked.
French: [translate:Il doit être bien ignorant puisqu'il répond à toutes les questions qu'on lui pose.]

Quote: Mistakes are the portals of discovery.
French: [translate:Les erreurs sont les portes de la découverte.]

Quote: Knowledge is power, but only when used wisely.
French: [translate:Le savoir est pouvoir, mais seulement s'il est bien utilisé.]
Context: Wisdom governs how knowledge is applied.

Quote: Error flies, truth comes limping after.
French: [translate:L’erreur vole, la vérité vient en boitant après elle.]
Context: Learning is a gradual process of correcting mistakes.

Quote: We must define words, or they will define us.
French: [translate:Il faut définir les mots, ou ils nous définiront.]
Context: Clarity of terminology essential for learning.

Quote: The perfection of reason is to be able to see the flaws in its own arguments.
French: [translate:La perfection de la raison est de savoir voir les défauts de ses propres raisonnements.]
Context: Critical thinking is key to knowledge.

Quote: History teaches everything, even the future.
French: [translate:L'histoire enseigne tout, même l'avenir.]
Context: Knowledge from history prepares us for what’s to come.

Quote: Education is the true wealth.
French: [translate:L'éducation est la vraie richesse.]

Quote: We learn more from our enemies than from our friends.
French: [translate:On apprend plus de ses ennemis que de ses amis.]

Quote: All things must be examined, debated, and investigated without exception and without regard for anyone's feelings.
French: [translate:Toutes choses doivent être examinées, débattues, et étudiées sans exception, et sans égard pour les sentiments de personne.]
Context: Knowledge gained only through broad inquiry.

Quote: Chronology is the backbone of knowledge.
French: [translate:La chronologie est la colonne vertébrale du savoir.]

Quote: To succeed in knowledge, one must work hard, love much, and wait patiently.
French: [translate:Pour réussir dans le savoir, il faut travailler dur, aimer beaucoup, et attendre patiemment.]

Quote: To admire knowledge is to respect effort.
French: [translate:Admirer le savoir, c'est respecter l'effort.]
Context: Work leads to appreciation of wisdom.

Quote: Learning is the only treasure thieves cannot destroy.
French: [translate:L'apprentissage est le seul trésor que les voleurs ne peuvent détruire.]

Quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgment.
French: [translate:Le bon jugement vient de l'expérience, et l'expérience vient du mauvais jugement.]

Quote: True knowledge is knowing the extent of one's ignorance.
French: [translate:La vraie connaissance est de savoir l'étendue de son ignorance.]

Quote: Knowledge is useless without application.
French: [translate:Le savoir est inutile sans l'application.]

Quote: To pursue knowledge is to risk comfort for wisdom.
French: [translate:Poursuivre le savoir, c'est risquer le confort pour la sagesse.]

Quote: Work spares us from three evils: boredom, vice, and need.
French: [translate:Le travail éloigne de nous trois grands maux: l'ennui, le vice et le besoin.]
Context: Praised the educational power of diligent work.

Quote: Friendship is the marriage of souls.
French: [translate:L'amitié est le mariage des âmes.]

Quote: Let us read and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world.
French: [translate:Il faut lire et il faut danser; ces deux amusements ne feront jamais de mal au monde.]

Quote: The heart has its reasons which reason knows not.
French: [translate:Le cœur a ses raisons que la raison ne connaît pas.]
Context: Friendship based on feeling, not logic.

Quote: True friends are those who help us to see truth in our lives.
French: [translate:Les vrais amis sont ceux qui nous aident à voir la vérité dans nos vies.]

Quote: One always speaks badly when one has nothing to say.
French: [translate:On parle toujours mal quand on n'a rien à dire.]

Quote: There is only one thing more important than love in the world: friendship.
French: [translate:Il n'y a qu'une chose plus importante que l'amour dans le monde: l'amitié.]
Context: Distinguishes importance of friendship over romantic love.

Quote: Friendship doubles joy and halves sorrow.
French: [translate:L'amitié double la joie et réduit de moitié la douleur.]

Quote: All men are equal; it is not birth, but virtue, that makes the difference.
French: [translate:Les hommes sont égaux; ce n'est pas la naissance, mais la vertu qui fait la différence.]

Quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
French: [translate:La seule façon d'avoir un ami, c'est d'en être un.]

Quote: Friendship is a slow-growing plant.
French: [translate:L’amitié est une plante qui croît lentement.]

Quote: Friendship often ends in love, but love rarely ends in friendship.
French: [translate:L'amitié finit souvent en amour, mais l'amour finit rarement en amitié.]

Quote: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.
French: [translate:L'amitié est l'ombre du soir, qui augmente avec le soleil couchant de la vie.]
Context: Friendship becomes more important with age.

Quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings.
French: [translate:Un véritable ami est la plus grande de toutes les bénédictions.]

Quote: Friendship is a sheltering tree.
French: [translate:L'amitié est un arbre qui protège.]

Quote: Friendship is the chain by which the world is joined.
French: [translate:L'amitié est la chaîne qui unit le monde.]

Quote: Friends are the family you choose for yourself.
French: [translate:Les amis sont la famille que l'on choisit soi-même.]

Quote: Cultivate friendship—neglect it, and weeds will grow.
French: [translate:Cultivez l'amitié—négligez-la et les mauvaises herbes pousseront.]

Quote: Friendship is to forget oneself for another.
French: [translate:L'amitié, c'est s'oublier soi-même pour l'autre.]

Quote: Friendship is love without wings.
French: [translate:L'amitié est l'amour sans ailes.]

Quote: The greatest happiness is friendship.
French: [translate:Le plus grand bonheur est l'amitié.]

Quote: Each friend represents a world in us.
French: [translate:Chaque ami représente un monde en nous.]

Quote: Good friends prevent bad days.
French: [translate:Les bons amis évitent les mauvais jours.]

Quote: True friends delight in each other's success.
French: [translate:Les vrais amis se réjouissent du succès de l'autre.]

Quote: Friendship is a priceless gem that can never be bought or sold.
French: [translate:L'amitié est un joyau sans prix qui ne peut être acheté ni vendu.]
Context: Worth of friendship cannot be measured.

Quote: Friendship is the light that shines in dark times.
French: [translate:L'amitié est la lumière qui luit dans les moments sombres.]

Quote: I do not agree with what you say, but I will defend to the death your right to say it.
French: [translate:Je ne suis pas d'accord avec ce que vous dites, mais je défendrai jusqu'à la mort votre droit de le dire.]

Quote: Liberty of thought is the life of the soul.
French: [translate:La liberté de penser est la vie de l'âme.]

Quote: The right to free thought is the most sacred of rights.
French: [translate:Le droit de penser librement est le plus sacré des droits.]
Context: Holds speech as the core liberty.

Quote: Think for yourself and let others enjoy the privilege of doing so too.
French: [translate:Pensez par vous-même et laissez aux autres le privilège d’en faire autant.]
Context: Defends everyone’s right to free thought.

Quote: To hold a pen is to be at war.
French: [translate:Tenir une plume, c'est être en guerre.]
Context: Speech is a weapon for justice.

Quote: Liberty and freedom are the language of nations.
French: [translate:La liberté et la franchise sont le langage des nations.]
Context: Nations are built on speech and free ideas.

Quote: Every man has the right to speak his mind.
French: [translate:Tout homme a le droit de dire ce qu'il pense.]

Quote: It is dangerous to be right when the government is wrong.
French: [translate:Il est dangereux d'avoir raison dans des affaires où des hommes en place ont tort.]
Context: Risks of honest speech in repressive societies.

Quote: Freedom is won by those who dare to speak.
French: [translate:La liberté est gagnée par ceux qui osent parler.]

Quote: Fanaticism is a monster that professes to be the child of religion.
French: [translate:Le fanatisme est un monstre qui prétend être l'enfant de la religion.]
Context: Warned against censorship in the name of faith.

Quote: Present opportunities are not to be neglected; they rarely visit us twice—especially in speech.
French: [translate:Les occasions de parler ne doivent pas être négligées; elles nous visitent rarement deux fois.]

Quote: The secret of being boring is to say everything—great speech is selective.
French: [translate:Le secret d'ennuyer est de tout dire—la bonne parole est sélective.]

Quote: To succeed in the world, it is not enough to be stupid, you must also be well-mannered in speech.
French: [translate:Pour réussir dans le monde, il ne suffit pas d'être bête, il faut aussi être bien élevé dans son discours.]

Quote: Liberty is not only a right, it is a duty—even in speech.
French: [translate:La liberté n’est pas seulement un droit, c’est un devoir—même dans la parole.]

Quote: True freedom is the power to speak honestly.
French: [translate:La vraie liberté est le pouvoir de parler honnêtement.]

Quote: Talent is nothing without the ability to speak up.
French: [translate:Le talent n'est rien sans la capacité de s'exprimer.]

Quote: Men argue; nature acts.
French: [translate:Les hommes discutent; la nature agit.]
Context: Speech is essential for human change.

Quote: The best is the enemy of the good—even in speech.
French: [translate:Le mieux est l'ennemi du bien—même dans la parole.]
Context: Practical speech is more effective than perfect words.

Quote: Fear follows silent speech and is its punishment.
French: [translate:La peur suit la parole silencieuse et en est la punition.]

Quote: Persons of wit never say everything—they select their words.
French: [translate:Les gens d’esprit ne disent jamais tout—ils choisissent leurs mots.]

Quote: The most useful speech is one whose listeners believe they could have delivered.
French: [translate:Le discours le plus utile est celui dont les auditeurs pensent qu'ils auraient pu le prononcer.]

Quote: No opinion is worth burning your neighbor for—freedom of speech protects dissent.
French: [translate:Aucune opinion ne vaut la peine de brûler son voisin—la liberté de parole protège la dissidence.]

Quote: A true lover of truth loves speech more than silence.
French: [translate:Un véritable amoureux de la vérité aime la parole plus que le silence.]

Quote: Speech is the painting of the mind.
French: [translate:La parole est la peinture de l’esprit.]

Quote: Freedom is won by those who dare.
French: [translate:La liberté est gagnée par ceux qui osent.]
Context: Emphasizes boldness in pursuit of freedom.

Quote: It is dangerous to be right when the government is wrong.
French: [translate:Il est dangereux d'avoir raison dans des affaires où des hommes en place ont tort.]

Quote: True courage is to think rightly and to act honestly.
French: [translate:Le vrai courage est de penser juste et d'agir honnêtement.]

Quote: When we meet with death, let us not shudder as though something unfamiliar fell upon us.
French: [translate:Quand nous rencontrons la mort, ne tremblons pas comme si quelque chose d'inconnu nous arrivait.]

Quote: Courage is the foundation of all virtue.
French: [translate:Le courage est le fondement de toutes les vertus.]

Quote: The happiest lives are those lived with courage and conviction.
French: [translate:Les vies les plus heureuses sont celles menées avec courage et conviction.]

Quote: He who is brave is free.
French: [translate:Celui qui est courageux est libre.]

Quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
French: [translate:Le courage n'est pas l'absence de peur, mais le triomphe sur elle.]

Quote: The greatest courage is to forgive.
French: [translate:Le plus grand courage est de pardonner.]

Quote: Nothing is so dangerous as the timid man who is afraid to act.
French: [translate:Rien n'est aussi dangereux que l'homme timide qui craint d'agir.]

Quote: Boldness outweighs skill.
French: [translate:L'audace compte plus que l'habileté.]

Quote: Courage is contagious.
French: [translate:Le courage est contagieux.]

Quote: Work is a refuge from unhappiness and a path to courage.
French: [translate:Le travail est un refuge contre le malheur et un chemin vers le courage.]

Quote: Be brave enough to be yourself.
French: [translate:Soyez assez courageux pour être vous-même.]

Quote: Courage means speaking up for others who cannot.
French: [translate:Le courage consiste à parler pour les autres qui ne le peuvent pas.]

Quote: Courage grows by confronting difficulties.
French: [translate:Le courage grandit lorsqu'on affronte les difficultés.]

Quote: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom and the sign of courage.
French: [translate:Vaincre la peur est le commencement de la sagesse et le signe du courage.]

Quote: No life worth remembering was lived quietly.
French: [translate:Aucune vie digne de mémoire n'a été vécue dans la tranquillité.]

Quote: To risk comfort for progress is an act of courage.
French: [translate:Risque le confort pour le progrès est un acte de courage.]

Quote: True courage welcomes adversity as a teacher.
French: [translate:Le vrai courage accueille l'adversité comme un maître.]

Quote: It takes courage to forgive oneself.
French: [translate:Il faut du courage pour se pardonner soi-même.]

Quote: Fear is a shadow, courage is a beacon.
French: [translate:La peur est une ombre, le courage est un phare.]

Quote: The courageous build the future; the cowardly preserve the past.
French: [translate:Les courageux construisent l'avenir; les lâches préservent le passé.]

Quote: To live with courage is to live without regret.
French: [translate:Vivre avec courage, c'est vivre sans regret.]

Quote: Courage is the light that breaks the darkness of doubt.
French: [translate:Le courage est la lumière qui brise l'obscurité du doute.]

Quote: It is only a woman who understands the subtlety of suffering.
French: [translate:Seule une femme comprend la subtilité de la souffrance.]

Quote: Virtue is not hereditary, nor is it gendered.
French: [translate:La vertu n'est pas héréditaire, ni propre à un sexe.]
Context: Virtue belongs to all, regardless of gender.

Quote: A witty woman is a treasure; a witty man is a pleasure.
French: [translate:Une femme d'esprit est un trésor; un homme d'esprit est un plaisir.]
Context: Praises clever women as rare treasures.

Quote: All the reasonings of men are not worth one sentiment of a woman.
French: [translate:Tous les raisonnements des hommes ne valent pas un seul sentiment d'une femme.]

Quote: Women are more steadfast in adversity than men.
French: [translate:Les femmes sont plus constantes dans l'adversité que les hommes.]

Quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence, and women master both.
French: [translate:L'amour est le triomphe de l'imagination sur l'intelligence, et les femmes maîtrisent les deux.]

Quote: Women are the poetry of the world.
French: [translate:Les femmes sont la poésie du monde.]
Context: Attributes beauty and inspiration to women.

Quote: The heart has its reasons which reason knows not, especially the heart of a woman.
French: [translate:Le cœur a ses raisons que la raison ne connaît pas, surtout le cœur d'une femme.]

Quote: Women make the years blossom, men merely count them.
French: [translate:Les femmes font fleurir les années, les hommes ne font que les compter.]
Context: Credits vitality and beauty to women.

Quote: If God did not exist, men would have invented women.
French: [translate:Si Dieu n'existait pas, les hommes auraient inventé les femmes.]
Context: Satirical praise for necessity of women.

Quote: A strong woman inspires respect, never fear.
French: [translate:Une femme forte inspire le respect, jamais la peur.]

Quote: Women teach men the meaning of patience.
French: [translate:Les femmes enseignent aux hommes la signification de la patience.]

Quote: Men argue, women act.
French: [translate:Les hommes discutent, les femmes agissent.]

Quote: A woman’s smile can vanquish armies.
French: [translate:Le sourire d'une femme peut vaincre des armées.]
Context: Power of female charm and influence.

Quote: There are more battles won by women’s tears than men’s swords.
French: [translate:Il y a plus de batailles gagnées par les larmes des femmes que par les épées des hommes.]

Quote: Behind every great man is a remarkable woman.
French: [translate:Derrière chaque grand homme se trouve une femme remarquable.]
Context: The role of women in supporting greatness.

Quote: Women possess more courage in silence than men do in speech.
French: [translate:Les femmes possèdent plus de courage dans le silence que les hommes dans la parole.]

Quote: Women care more about truth than reputation.
French: [translate:Les femmes se préoccupent plus de la vérité que de la réputation.]

Quote: The wisdom of women governs the folly of men.
French: [translate:La sagesse des femmes gouverne la folie des hommes.]
Context: Women’s wisdom as a social guide.

Quote: There would be fewer wars if women governed the world.
French: [translate:Il y aurait moins de guerres si les femmes gouvernaient le monde.]
Context: Strong claim for peace under female leadership.

Quote: Women forgive but do not forget; men forget but do not forgive.
French: [translate:Les femmes pardonnent mais n'oublient pas; les hommes oublient mais ne pardonnent pas.]

Quote: The art of pleasing is the domain of women.
French: [translate:L'art de plaire est le domaine de la femme.]
Context: Women as artists of social grace.

Quote: Women are the rhyme of life's poetry.
French: [translate:Les femmes sont la rime de la poésie de la vie.]
Context: Women complete the beauty of existence.

Quote: There is nothing ordinary about a remarkable woman.
French: [translate:Il n'y a rien d'ordinaire chez une femme remarquable.]

Quote: To understand a woman is an achievement; to love a woman is an art.
French: [translate:Comprendre une femme est un exploit; aimer une femme est un art.]
Context: Complexity and beauty of relationships with women.

Quote: A woman’s voice is the sweetest note in the music of life.
French: [translate:La voix d'une femme est la plus douce note dans la musique de la vie.]
Context: Beauty and harmony in female expression.

Quote: Men argue; nature acts.
French: [translate:Les hommes discutent; la nature agit.]
Context: Contrasts men's inclination for debate with nature’s decisiveness.

Quote: All men are born with a nose and ten fingers, but no one was born with a knowledge of geometry.
French: [translate:Tous les hommes sont nés avec un nez et dix doigts, mais aucun n'est né avec la connaissance de la géométrie.]
Context: Men’s knowledge is acquired, not innate.

Quote: Virtue is not hereditary, nor limited to men.
French: [translate:La vertu n'est pas héréditaire, ni limitée aux hommes.]
Context: Ethics and virtue apply to all genders.

Quote: Men are equal; it is not birth, but virtue, that makes the difference.
French: [translate:Les hommes sont égaux; ce n'est pas la naissance, mais la vertu qui fait la différence.]
Context: Equality and merit among men matter most.

Quote: Men make laws, women make customs.
French: [translate:Les hommes font les lois, les femmes font les coutumes.]
Context: Contrasts the influence of men and women.

Quote: All the reasonings of men are not worth one sentiment of a woman.
French: [translate:Tous les raisonnements des hommes ne valent pas un seul sentiment d'une femme.]

Quote: Men often forget what women always remember.
French: [translate:Les hommes oublient souvent ce que les femmes n’oublient jamais.]

Quote: A man is rich in proportion to the things he can afford to let alone.
French: [translate:Un homme est riche dans la mesure où il peut se passer de choses.]

Quote: Men rarely learn from history.
French: [translate:Les hommes apprennent rarement de l'histoire.]

Quote: It is dangerous to be right when the government is wrong.
French: [translate:Il est dangereux d'avoir raison dans des affaires où des hommes en place ont tort.]
Context: Highlights men’s bravery in speaking the truth.

Quote: Men are often fools for riches—women for love.
French: [translate:Les hommes sont souvent fous pour les richesses—les femmes pour l'amour.]

Quote: The strength of men lies in their unity.
French: [translate:La force des hommes réside dans leur unité.]

Quote: Men build walls, women build bridges.
French: [translate:Les hommes construisent des murs, les femmes construisent des ponts.]

Quote: Men often judge, but rarely understand.
French: [translate:Les hommes jugent souvent mais comprennent rarement.]

Quote: Man is free at the moment he wishes to be.
French: [translate:L'homme est libre au moment où il veut l'être.]

Quote: Men’s greatest strength is knowing their own weaknesses.
French: [translate:La plus grande force des hommes est de connaître leurs faiblesses.]

Quote: No man is truly great unless he is good.
French: [translate:Nul homme n'est vraiment grand s'il n'est pas bon.]

Quote: Men often talk, but seldom listen.
French: [translate:Les hommes parlent souvent, mais écoutent rarement.]

Quote: A man’s honor is more important than his money.
French: [translate:L’honneur d’un homme est plus important que son argent.]

Quote: Men fear the judgment of other men more than that of the gods.
French: [translate:Les hommes craignent le jugement des autres hommes plus que celui des dieux.]

Quote: The courage of men is made visible only by their actions.
French: [translate:Le courage des hommes ne se montre que dans leurs actions.]

Quote: Men seek perfection, but find happiness in imperfection.
French: [translate:Les hommes cherchent la perfection, mais trouvent le bonheur dans l’imperfection.]

Quote: Men insist on justice when they feel wronged.
French: [translate:Les hommes exigent la justice lorsqu'ils se sentent lésés.]
Context: Justice is a personal concern for men.

Quote: Great men are those who speak for the weak.
French: [translate:Les grands hommes sont ceux qui parlent pour les faibles.]

Quote: Men that know everything can teach nothing.
French: [translate:Les hommes qui savent tout ne peuvent rien enseigner.]
Context: Humility necessary to be a teacher.

Quote: A good man is a light in the darkness.
French: [translate:Un homme bon est une lumière dans les ténèbres.]

Quote: Time, the devourer of all things, also devours history.
French: [translate:Le temps, dévoreur de toutes choses, dévore aussi l'histoire.]

Quote: Chronology is the backbone of knowledge.
French: [translate:La chronologie est la colonne vertébrale du savoir.]
Context: Order and sequence vital to understanding.

Quote: All history fades into fable with time.
French: [translate:Toute histoire devient fabuleuse avec le temps.]
Context: Truth and myth blend in the long run.

Quote: Each age brings its own happiness.
French: [translate:Chaque âge apporte son propre bonheur.]
Context: Every period of life offers unique joy.

Quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
French: [translate:La nature ne se presse pas, pourtant tout s’accomplit.]

Quote: Time heals all wounds but leaves its marks.
French: [translate:Le temps guérit toutes les blessures mais laisse ses marques.]
Context: Healing but lingering reminders of the past.

Quote: Time is money, but not all money buys time.
French: [translate:Le temps c'est de l'argent, mais tout l'argent ne rachète pas le temps.]

Quote: The happiest lives are those lived with courage and conviction, making the most of their time.
French: [translate:Les vies les plus heureuses sont celles menées avec courage et conviction, profitant au maximum du temps.]
Context: Full lives shape the use of time.

Quote: There is nothing new in nature, only new eyes to see it, and new times to discover it.
French: [translate:Il n’y a rien de nouveau dans la nature, seulement de nouveaux yeux pour la voir et de nouveaux temps pour la découvrir.]
Context: Every age finds its own truths.

Quote: Time is the only critic without ambition and the only judge without pretense.
French: [translate:Le temps est le seul critique sans ambition et le seul juge sans prétention.]

Quote: Truth is not the daughter of authority, but of time.
French: [translate:La vérité n'est pas la fille de l'autorité, mais celle du temps.]

Quote: No rich man is ever satisfied with his time.
French: [translate:Aucun homme riche n'est jamais satisfait de son temps.]
Context: Riches cannot extend time or satisfaction.

Quote: Work is a refuge from unhappiness and a wise use of time.
French: [translate:Le travail est un refuge contre le malheur et une utilisation sage du temps.]

Quote: Time spent regretting is time lost twice.
French: [translate:Le temps passé à regretter est du temps perdu deux fois.]
Context: Reflects on the futility of regret.

Quote: The art of happiness is the art of using time well.
French: [translate:L'art du bonheur est l'art d'utiliser bien le temps.]
Context: Efficient use of time brings joy.

Quote: Death is but a change of circumstance, not an end, only part of time’s flow.
French: [translate:La mort n'est qu'un changement de circonstance, non une fin, seulement une partie du cours du temps.]

Quote: The greatest happiness comes when least expected and in due time.
French: [translate:Le plus grand bonheur arrive quand on s'y attend le moins et en temps voulu.]

Quote: The greatest good you can do for another is not just share your riches, but share your time.
French: [translate:Le plus grand bien que vous puissiez faire à autrui n'est pas seulement de partager vos richesses, mais de partager votre temps.]

Quote: The past is a guidepost, not a hitching post.
French: [translate:Le passé est un panneau indicateur, pas une barrière.]

Quote: Youth is the time to learn; age is the time to teach.
French: [translate:La jeunesse est le temps d'apprendre; la vieillesse est le temps d'enseigner.]

Quote: Patience is the companion of time.
French: [translate:La patience est la compagne du temps.]
Context: Endurance is key to using time well.

Quote: To waste time is to betray one’s own life.
French: [translate:Gaspiller le temps, c'est trahir sa propre vie.]

Quote: Time reveals all things eventually.
French: [translate:Le temps révèle tout, finalement.]

Quote: Every age has its unique truth and its unique error—time makes them visible.
French: [translate:Chaque époque a sa vérité et son erreur unique—le temps les rend visibles.]
